mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN A.[day]=0 THEN '今日' ELSE '提醒' END) as dayDescription, A.estPartTime, A.caseCode, A.partCode, A.propertyAddr, A.processInstanceId, A.taskId FROM ( SELECT DATEDIFF(DD, transplan.EST_PART_TIME , GETDATE()) as 'day', transplan.EST_PART_TIME as 'estPartTime', transplan.CASE_CODE as 'caseCode', transplan.PART_CODE as 'partCode', propertyInfo.PROPERTY_ADDR as 'propertyAddr', task.PROC_INST_ID_ as 'processInstanceId', task.ID_ as 'taskId' FROM [sctrans].[T_TO_TRANS_PLAN] transplan inner join sctrans.act_ru_task as task on task.[TASK_DEF_KEY_]=transplan.PART_CODE inner join sctrans.t_TO_workflow w on w.case_code=transplan.CASE_CODE and w.INST_CODE=task.[PROC_INST_ID_] inner join [sctrans].T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO as propertyInfo on transplan.CASE_CODE = propertyInfo.CASE_CODE WHERE (DATEDIFF(DD, transplan.EST_PART_TIME , GETDATE()) > 2 OR DATEDIFF(DD, transplan.EST_PART_TIME , GETDATE()) = 0) and task.assignee_=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM [sctrans].[T_TS_MSG_SEND_HISTORY] where CASE_CODE=a.caseCode and PART_CODE=a.partCode and IS_SUCCESS=1 ) ORDER BY a.estPartTime DESC
